INDICATOR_NAME: Methane emissions in energy sector (thousand metric tons of CO2 equivalent)
SOURCE_NOTE: Methane emissions from energy processes are emissions from the production, handling, transmission, and combustion of fossil fuels and biofuels.
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: European Commission, Joint Research Centre (JRC)/Netherlands Environmental Assessment Agency (PBL). Emission Database for Global Atmospheric Research (EDGAR): http://edgar.jrc.ec.europa.eu/
